title: Charm and character throughout  2BR 1BA HW DW FP Yard 2CARS AVAIL NOW
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 617-586-6222 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A SHOWING.
SHOWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
Sunny and spacious 2br 1ba unit on the first floor in the highly sought out neighborhood just outside Cushing Square.
The unit features a large living room with a gorgeous working fireplace and beautiful built-in bookcases.
The dining room features a built-in hutch and the kitchen is fully applianced with a gas range, dishwasher, and refrigerator.
There are a washer and dryer in the basement as well as some additional storage.
Parking for two cars is provided including one garage space.
by gas and the tenant pays for all of their own utilities.
One cat will be considered at the owner's discretion.
There are front and rear porches and a yard for your outdoor enjoyment.
Just a few blocks to Cushing Square, buses to Harvard Square.
Convenient to the Waverley Square commuter rail station.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
